about.title: Intelligent Language Algorithms Laboratory
about.description1: The Intelligent Language Algorithms Laboratory (ILA Lab) is part of the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Chang Gung University, established in February 2025. As a young and dynamic research team, we are dedicated to cutting-edge research in natural language processing (NLP) and publishing in top-tier venues.
about.description2: Our research combines deep neural networks and large language models, in close collaboration with Linkou Chang Gung Memorial Hospital and National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University, aiming to tackle complex problems from an interdisciplinary perspective.
